quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

authorInfo.name: Steve Jobs
authorInfo.title: Co-founder of Apple Inc.
authorInfo.bio: An American inventor, designer and entrepreneur who was the co-founder, chief executive and chairman of Apple Computer.

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

authorInfo.name: Albert Einstein
authorInfo.title: Theoretical Physicist
authorInfo.bio: A German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics.

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

authorInfo.name: Nelson Mandela
authorInfo.title: President of South Africa
authorInfo.bio: A South African anti-apartheid revolutionary and political leader who served as the first president of South Africa from 1994 to 1999.

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

authorInfo.name: Eleanor Roosevelt
authorInfo.title: First Lady of the United States
authorInfo.bio: An American political figure, diplomat and activist who served as the first lady of the United States from 1933 to 1945.

quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

authorInfo.name: Socrates
authorInfo.title: Greek Philosopher
authorInfo.bio: A classical Greek philosopher credited as one of the founders of Western philosophy, and as being the first moral philosopher.
